zim.plugins.attachmentbrowser.filebrowser.delete_file(widget, file)¶

Delete a file

Parameters

  • widget – parent for new dialogs, Gtk.Widget or None

  • file – a File object

Raises

FileNotFoundError – if file does not exist

Rename a file

Parameters

  • widget – parent for new dialogs, Gtk.Widget or None

  • file – a File object

Raises

FileNotFoundError – if file does not exist

zim.plugins.attachmentbrowser.filerenamedialog module¶

class zim.plugins.attachmentbrowser.filerenamedialog.FileRenameDialog(parent, file)¶

Bases: zim.gui.widgets.Dialog

A dialog for renaming a file.

do_response_ok()¶

Handler called when the user clicks the “OK” button (or an equivalent button)

Returns

True if successfull and the dialog can close. Returns False if e.g. input is not valid, this will keep the dialog open.

Implementation

must be implemented by sub-classes that have an “OK” button

do_validate(widget, data)¶

Validating new file name, show error when validation fails and enable/disable ok button.

zim.plugins.attachmentbrowser.thumbnailer module¶

exception zim.plugins.attachmentbrowser.thumbnailer.ThumbnailCreatorFailure¶

Bases: ValueError

class zim.plugins.attachmentbrowser.thumbnailer.ThumbnailManager(thumbnailcreator=<function pixbufThumbnailCreator>)¶

Bases: object

This class implements thumbnails management (mostly) following the freedesktop.org spec.

create_thumbnail(file, size)¶

(Re-)create a thumbnail without any checking whether the old one is still valid.

Parameters

  • file – the file to be thumbnailed as File object

  • size – pixel size for thumbnail file as integer

Returns

a 2-tuple of the thumbnail file and a pixbuf object

Raises

ThumbnailCreatorFailure – if creation fails unexpectedly

get_thumbnail(file, size, create=True)¶

Looksup thumbnail and return it if a valid thumbnail is availabel.

Parameters

  • file – the file to be thumbnailed as File object

  • size – pixel size for thumbnail image as integer

  • create – if True we try to create the thumbnail if it doesn’t exist

Returns

a 2-tuple of the thumbnail file and a pixbuf object or 2 times None

get_thumbnail_file(file, size)¶

Get File object for thumbnail Does not guarantee that the thumbnail actually exists. Do not use this method to lookup the thumbnail, use get_thumbnail() instead.

Parameters

  • file – the original file to be thumbnailed

  • size – thumbnail size in pixels (THUMB_SIZE_NORMAL, THUMB_SIZE_LARGE, or integer)

Returns

a File object

remove_thumbnails(file)¶

Remove thumbnails for at all sizes To be used when thumbnails are outdated, e.g. when the original file is removed or updated.

Parameters

file – the original file

class zim.plugins.attachmentbrowser.thumbnailer.ThumbnailQueue(thumbnailcreator=<function pixbufThumbnailCreator>)¶

Bases: object

Wrapper for ThumbnailManager that does that actual thumbnailing in a separate thread and manages the requests and the results with queues.

clear_queue()¶
get_ready_thumbnail(block=False)¶

Check output queue for a thumbnail that is ready

Returns

a 5-tuple (file, size, thumbfile, pixbuf, mtime) or 5 times None when nothing is ready and block is False.

queue_empty()¶

Returns True when both input and output queue are empty

queue_thumbnail_request(file, size, mtime=None)¶

Add a new request to the queue

Parameters

  • file – a File object

  • size – the size of the thumbnail in pixels

  • mtime – the mtime of a previous loaded thumbnail, if this matches the current file, the request will be dropped

start()¶
zim.plugins.attachmentbrowser.thumbnailer.pixbufThumbnailCreator(file, thumbfile, thumbsize)¶

Thumbnailer implementation that uses the GdkPixbuf.Pixbuf functions to create the thumbnail.

Module contents¶

Zim plugin to display files in attachments folder.

teardown()¶

Remove changes made by this class from the extended object To be overloaded by child classes

Note

do not call parent class teardown() here, that is already taken care of by destroy()
